wikipedia_page.main: Lewis Horner (born 1 February 1992) is a professional footballer who plays as a midfielder. Horner has previously played for Hibernian, and a loan spell at East Stirlingshire. He has also played for Inverness Caledonian Thistle, Newcastle Benfield and he has had two spells at Blyth Spartans.
